ValidationRule.description: When Store New/Store Pending Statuses in OE request, CA has to filled field Store
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Operation_Exception', NOT( $User.BypassVR__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Store New'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Store Pending')), OR(ISBLANK(Store__c), ISNULL(Store__c)) )
